title: Instantaneous Velocity Equation
text: Instantaneous velocity at a is given by v(a)=lim{t,a,(s(t)-s(a))/(t-a)}
speech: Instantaneous velocity at a is given by v(a)=lim{t,a,(s(t)-s(a))/(t-a)}
pacedSpeech: Instantaneous velocity at a is given by v(a)=lim{t,a,(s(t)-s(a))/(t-a)}

title: Plugging In
text: Plug in $$a=2$$ into the instantaneous velocity equation.
speech: Plug in  a is equal to 2,  into the instantaneous velocity equation.
pacedSpeech: Plug in   a is equal to 2,
